parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of coedges for the coedges enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of coedges of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Number of coedges returned from the list; this value can be less than Celt if you asked for more coedges than exist, or it can be NULL if no more coedges exist

title: IEnumCoEdges.Next
description: Gets the next coedge in the coedges enumeration.
signature:
void Next( 
   System.Int32
Celt
,
   out CoEdge
Rgelt
,
   out System.Int32
PceltFetched
)

parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of coedges for the coedges enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of coedges of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Number of coedges returned from the list; this value can be less than Celt if you asked for more coedges than exist, or it can be NULL if no more coedges exist

remarks: For use in in-process DLLs only.
